entry.title: [WW] Currently swapping my schedule to prepare for a string of 10P-10A night shifts.
entry.content:
Currently swapping my schedule to prepare for a string of 10P-10A night shifts. It's quite isolating as well as disorienting- I'm exhausted but not sleepy, starving but not hungry.
I can't imagine doing this for months at a time and trying to maintain any family or social relationships, props to anyone in this thread who does it.
